earthquake.response: In case of an earthquake, drop, cover, and hold on. Move away from windows, doors, and heavy objects.

flood.response: In case of a flood, move to higher ground. Avoid walking or driving through floodwaters.

fire.response: In case of a fire, exit the building immediately. Avoid using elevators and stay low to avoid smoke inhalation.

tornado.response: In case of a tornado, take shelter in a basement or small windowless room on the lowest level of the building.
